author: 3esmit.stateofus.eth
content: I have a geth full node, I need to do some analysis in the current state of Ethereum, specifically I want to search for bytes in the code data of all contracts in state (I'll be searching for 4bytes function sigs). What is the best way to do this?

author: Deleted User
content: you can try to use `debug_accountRange` to retrieve the addresses of the contracts, page by page, and then use `eth_getCode` to get the code of each individual contract (if you see that its code hash is not the code hash of the empty code)

author: 3esmit.stateofus.eth
content: <@456226577798135808> wow, thanks, that's exactly what I was looking for!
